src:
BONUS TIKET 02: Idealno za početak vikenda
A ukupna kvota je uvećana sa 11,39 na 15

01 Nov 2019

Čekanju je kraj, novi ludi kladioničarski vikend je po nama, a tradicionalno već u petak popodne očekuje nas dosta fudbala.
I baš to je u fokusu BONUS TIKETA 02 gde se našlo četiri para, po jedan iz Cvajte, Turske 1, Norveške 1 i Rumunije 1. Parove, ali i igre odabrali su MOZZARTOVI stručnjaci koji svaki radni dan pokušavaju da vam pomognu na ovaj način.
Na kraju i ono najbolje - uvećana ukupna kvota, ovaj put sa 11,39 na 15.


(2,25) J. REGENZBURG (3,40) OSNBARIK (3,20)



(1,50) GALATASARAJ (4,30) RIZE (6,50)



(3,60) STROMSGODSET (3,45) ROZENBORG (2,05)



(1,50) VITORUL (4,30) KINDIJA (6,50)


Sve što je neophodno da uradite jeste da do 18.30 na bilo kom uplatnom mestu kladionice MOZZART kažete da želite da igrate BONUS TIKET 09. Naravno, ukoliko ste ljubitelj online klađenja, možete tiket odigrati i na zvaničnom sajtu - mozzartbet.com.



Foto: MOZZART BET
text:
BONUS TICKET 02: Ideal for a weekend getaway
And the total quota was increased from 11.39 to 15

01 Nov 2019

The wait is over, a new crazy bookmaking weekend is upon us, and traditionally as early as Friday afternoon, a lot of football awaits us.
And that's exactly the focus of BONUS TICKET 02, where four pairs were found, one each from Cvajte, Turkey 1, Norway 1 and Romania 1. The pairs and games were selected by MOZZART experts who try to help you every day in this way.
Finally, the best - increased total quota, this time from 11.39 to 15.


(2.25) J. REGENZBURG (3.40) OSNBARIK (3.20)



(1.50) GALATASARAJ (4.30) RIZE (6.50)



(3.60) STROMSGODSET (3.45) ROSENBORG (2.05)



(1,50) VITORUL (4,30) KINDIA (6,50)


All you have to do is say by 6.30pm on any payment site of MOZZART that you want to play BONUS TICKET 09. Of course, if you are a fan of online betting, you can also play the ticket on the official website - mozzartbet.com.



Photo: MOZZART BET
